name: VReaking Ball
description:
Get ready to master the art of demolition destruction. 

VReackingBall features realistic building physics and destruction for the players to enjoy.

VReackingBall is game made by students where you can destroy an entire building while you control a demolition crane. 

This game is playable with an xbox controller or with any VR device.

Teacher:

  • Jose Antonio Andujar (@jandujar2)
